messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: The science department has concluded that the engineering team is a bunch of tards

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Due to the level 5 biohazard on-station, i have given the AI the quarantine lawset and i want sec patrolling near the evac shuttle with riot shields

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I am a pretty MAN, this is the captain by the way. I am ready

messages.body:
